name: wow-spell-tooltips
description: Display World of Warcraft spell data in Visual Studio Code

colors.description: Background color for spell id matches.

wowSpellTooltips.minNumber.markdownDescription: Specifies the lowest number for which spell lookups will be performed. If you're working with older spells, you might want to set this lower.

wowSpellTooltips.maxNumber.markdownDescription: Specifies the largest number for which spell lookups will be performed.

wowSpellTooltips.style.underline.markdownDescription: Specifies whether spell ids should be underlined.

wowSpellTooltips.style.backgroundColor.markdownDescription: Specifies whether spell ids be highlighted with a different background color. It can be customized via `wowSpellTooltips.spellIdBackground` in your workspace settings.
